definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: The fact that you were den leader in your Cub Scouttroop is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 你在童子军做教练员就是无关的信息。

sentences.english: Can the managers and the substitute players proceed to the waiting area.
sentences.chinese: 请教练员和替补队员到替换席。

sentences.english: The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.
sentences.chinese: 这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。

sentences.english: The fact that you were den leader in your Cub Scout troop is irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 你在童子军做童子军教练员就是无关的信息。

sentences.english: No a unified system of training coaches and inter-school competitions system.
sentences.chinese: 没有统一的教练员培训制度和校际比赛制度。

sentences.english: In international basketball only a coach can call a time -out .
sentences.chinese: 但在国际比赛里，只有教练员可以申请暂停。

sentences.english: And when should a coach call a time-out?
sentences.chinese: 还有，教练员什么时候叫暂停呢？

sentences.english: Zhong Zhou sailing Club employed two sailing teachers from Qingdao .
sentences.chinese: 中州帆船会聘用了两位教练员来自青岛。

sentences.english: The trainer is training the trainees how to drive a train.
sentences.chinese: 教练员正在教受训者怎样开火车。

sentences.english: There are many excellent athletes and coaches in each period.
sentences.chinese: 不同年代都有许多优秀的运动员和教练员。

sentences.english: Shall this technical foul be penalized as a coach's foul?
sentences.chinese: 是否将这个技术犯规记作教练员的犯规？

sentences.english: The coach patted the player on the back and said a few encouraging words.
sentences.chinese: 教练员拍拍运动员的肩膀，说了几句鼓舞士气的话。

sentences.english: They need to be coaches, not judges.
sentences.chinese: 他们应扮演教练员，而非法官的角色。

sentences.english: Coaches realize hiring system, open selection of outstanding coaches.
sentences.chinese: 实现教练员选聘制度，公开选拔优秀教练员。

sentences.english: Coaches realize hiring system, open selection of outstanding coaches.
sentences.chinese: 实现教练员选聘制度，公开选拔优秀教练员。

sentences.english: Instructors were trained and big tournaments were organized.
sentences.chinese: 各地培训双节棍教练员，组织武术大赛，如火如荼。

definition: club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
